function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of clear communication about policies & protocols leading to confusion and non-compliance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feelings of loneliness and gratitude among employees affecting mental health and well-being.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empowerment and support for on-the-ground teams to find solutions for crisis management.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empathy and understanding from leaders towards employees’ work-life balance concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health challenges due to pandemic-related emotional impact","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on safety protocols and new skills for employees returning to work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty affecting employees’ ability to meet basic needs.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of centralized document access and communication may lead to inconsistent understanding of protective measures and infection transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential breach of confidential medical information and biased decision-making based on medical conditions may lead to legal and ethical implications.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritizing higher-level employee needs without adequately addressing physiological, safety, and social needs may lead to decreased employee well-being and performance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial hardship for employees and business partners","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary resort closure leading to financial strain on employees and potential economic impact on the local community.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and guidance leading to anxiety and stress among employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health crisis and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High employee engagement and satisfaction levels may lead to complacency and reduced vigilance in maintaining health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the impact of employee initiatives and strategic plans on disease transmission risk within the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between employee engagement initiatives and health and safety protocols, leading to a compromised environment for disease transmission control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disengaged employees can impact on the guest experience and the business loses not only money but reputation as a result.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Talent turnover costs the business in both money and time.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through close contact among employees and guests","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on contagious disease prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for handling employee illness and isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hygiene measures in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emotional support and engagement with employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with legal and regulatory requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of open and honest discussions about business realities and upcoming plans","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate employee engagement, learning, and development measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unplanned response to the pandemic impact on the organization","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of financial resources for community consolidation and access to information","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social protection for low-paid insecure workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of protective equipment for at-risk workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antibiotic overuse leading to drug resistance and ineffective treatment of infectious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements and poor living conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health system vulnerability in regions with limited resources, affecting access to care and critical healthcare services.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste disposal posing biohazard risks, including potential transmission of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges around space, water, and sanitation in informal settlements increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements are at risk of eviction, leading to increased vulnerability to covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control of covid-19 in informal settlements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of top-down control measures as oppressive","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ignored public health regulations in informal settlements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contested governance structures and plural leadership","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality and poverty leading to varied vulnerability profiles in informal settlements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatization and blame of residents of informal settlements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor coordination between health authorities and urban stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and sanitation in informal urban settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to social, political, and economic contexts influencing vulnerability to disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to basic services and public health interventions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and partnerships with local community structures and authorities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of formal data sources in informal settlements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
